snippet.title: Danny Phantom Ghost Sweep - 3D Groove Games
snippet.description: No commentary this time around - this game is a bit loud to talk over. This is a walkthrough for a NickArcade game which was made in (or at least, copyrighted) 2004 and was available online on Nick.com . I actually didn't really watch this show (YTV surely aired it but I just haden't seen it,) but this game is actually pretty fun once you learn how to play it. The graphics have also held up surprisingly well - I've forced the game to use OpenGL for your viewing pleasure. If I had one complaint, the audio mixing is pretty poor. I don't know why the video got stuttery at a couple points, but it seems to be fine throughout most of the video.
